name: gyre
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
geography
  specialized a circular pattern of ocean currents (= flows of water in a particular direction): The area is one of the world’s five major ocean gyres – huge systems of rotating currents.
literary a circular movement in which each circle is above, below, or wider than the one before: The hawk wheels in a widening gyre.

literary to move in circles: He liked to sketch gyring vultures.
